plugin.warn.no-selection.context: Warning in the console output is displayed to the user when they attempt to do an action in the plugin that requires them to select a LightingProfile.
plugin.warn.no-selection.en-us: WARNING: You must select a LightingProfile

plugin.toolbar.context: Name of the plugin followed by (%s/%s) which is replaced with the version numbers

plugin.button.create-profile.title.context: Button title for creating a new LightingProfile instance from the current lighting

plugin.button.create-profile.description.context: Button description for creating a new LightingProfile instance from the current lighting
plugin.button.create-profile.description.en-us: Creates a new LightingProfile from the current lighting.

plugin.naming.new-profile-default-name.context: Name for new LightingProfile instances, %s is replaced with the current date

plugin.button.apply-profile.title.context: Button title for applying a selected LightingProfile to the current lighting

plugin.button.apply-profile.description.context: Button description for applying a selected LightingProfile to the current lighting

plugin.button.get-api.title.context: Button title for inserting the plugin API code into the game for use with scripts

plugin.button.get-api.description.context: Button description for inserting the plugin API code into the game for use with scripts
plugin.button.get-api.description.en-us: Gives you the API required to use this plugin in your code.

plugin.button.overwrite-profile.title.context: Button title for overwriting the selected LightingProfile with the current lighting

plugin.button.overwrite-profile.descript.context: Button description for overwriting the selected LightingProfile with the current lighting
